QuestData.Title: Lok-rath is Secured
QuestData.Description: With their leader dead, the remaining Warsong will be easy pickings.$B$BAs soon as that's done, I'll pull our soldiers out of Lok-rath and head for Grommashar.$B$BIf you're heading back to Wor'var, inform Thrall that we'll be ready soon.
QuestData.RewardText: If you hadn't gone to Lok-rath, our forces would have been decimated.$B$BI'm sorry to hear they laid a trap you. You have a reputation now.
